headline: US beer slowdown “cyclical” and will ease, Molson Coors CEO says
summary: Gavin Hattersley, meanwhile, said “promotional intensity” in the UK had increased in recent months.

headline: Molson Coors had its biggest earnings miss in 4 years because consumers are too worried by tariffs to drink
summary: The Coors Light and Blue Moon brewer reported a brutal first quarter for 2025, missing analyst estimates by nearly $100 million.
